author: Anonymous Mouse
title: not receiving emails
question: i was told by someone that lecture would be online tomorrow because of a covid exposure for my section. However, for some reason I did not receive an email about this while others did. I am unsure of why this is and now am slightly concerned that I have not received emails about important information regarding the course.
student_answer: Check your SSC UBC emails and Canvas announcements. If not there, you should continue to attend class.
